member.name: T:Rookie.BitUtility
member.summary: Utility for converting data types to/from arrays of bytes

member.name: M:Rookie.BitUtility.ValidateGetSetArgs(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Validates the arguments for a get/set method
member.exception: is less than zero or greater than -

member.name: P:Rookie.BitUtility.IntIsLittleEndian
member.summary: Byte order of integer values when stored in memory
member.remarks:
True indicates integer values are stored using little-endian
False indicates integer values are stored using big-endian

member.name: P:Rookie.BitUtility.FloatIsLittleEndian
member.summary: Byte order of floating-point values when stored in memory
member.remarks:
True indicates floating-point values are stored using little-endian
False indicates floating-point values are stored using big-endian
